name: asset-catalog-extractor
title: Asset Catalog Extractor
description: Quickly extract Asset Catalog files (.car) using Asset Catalog Tinkerer
author: chrismessina

commands.name: index
commands.title: Extract Catalog
commands.subtitle: Asset Catalog Extractor
commands.description: Quickly extract Asset Catalog files (.car) using Asset Catalog Tinkerer

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
